libsource.description: Dual Micropower DC/DC Converter with Positive and Negative Outputs, MSOP-10
Low power, analog thermistor temperature sensor, ±2C accuracy, -40C to +125C, in SOT-23-3
Dual Micropower DC/DC Converter with Positive and Negative Outputs, MSOP-10
Generic connector, double row, 02x06, counter clockwise pin numbering scheme (similar to DIP packge numbering), script generated (kicad-library-utils/schlib/autogen/connector/)
250mA Low Quiscent Current LDO, 3.3V output, SOT-23
0.2A Ic, 40V Vce, Small Signal NPN Transistor, SOT-23
0.2A Ic, 40V Vce, Small Signal NPN Transistor, SOT-23
0.2A Ic, 40V Vce, Small Signal NPN Transistor, SOT-23
Positive 60-250mA Low Dropout Regulator, Fixed Output, SOT-23
1x DIP Switch, Single Pole Single Throw (SPST) switch, small symbol

libpart.description: Generic connector, double row, 02x06, counter clockwise pin numbering scheme (similar to DIP packge numbering), script generated (kicad-library-utils/schlib/autogen/connector/)
300mA Low Dropout Voltage Regulator, Fixed Output 1.2V, SOT-23
250mA Low Quiscent Current LDO, 3.0V output, SOT-23
Dual Micropower DC/DC Converter with Positive and Negative Outputs, MSOP-10
Low power, analog thermistor temperature sensor, ±4C accuracy, -40C to +150C, in SOT-23-3
